title: Portfolio Forger
description: Craft stunning, AI-powered portfolios that get you hired. Our platform helps you write professional bios, tailor unique portfolios for specific recruiters, and instantly export a downloadable, theme-matched resume.

title: JavaScript Tetris Game
description: A classic arcade game built from the ground up with vanilla JavaScript, HTML5 Canvas for rendering, and complex logic for piece manipulation and collision detection.

title: Dynamic Quiz App
description: An interactive quiz application that fetches questions from an external API, tracks scores, and provides a dynamic user experience, showcasing asynchronous JavaScript.

title: Movies & TV Show Browser
description: CineTrack is a sleek web application for tracking and discovering movies and TV shows, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It uses the TMDb API to fetch and display dynamic content for a rich user experience.

title: QR CODE GENERATOR
description: INSTANT QR CODE GENRATOR FOR ANY VALID LINK
